haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Luther Schaumann
Fw Detlef Schwarzer
Uffz Karl Nostitz

 The mission was flown from Balatre,E Roye aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 31/07/1916 near Arras.
A Sopwith Triplane of No 1 Squadron RNAS was brought down by Baldemar May of Jasta 16b.
Flt Lt Desmond Burton was killed in action.
Baldemar May was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 31/07/1916 near Prosnes.
A F.E.2b of Esc 70 was brought down by Erhard Kesselring of Jasta 16b.
Sergt Michel Ventre was killed in action.
Lt Samuel Lachat was killed in action.
Erhard Kesselring was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.
